summary: This document is a Servicing Disclosure Statement from Fifth Third Mortgage Co, outlining the rights of mortgage loan applicants under the Real Estate Settlement Procedures Act (RESPA). It informs applicants about the potential transfer of loan servicing and the rights associated with such transfers.
keyFacts: The document is a Servicing Disclosure Statement related to mortgage loan applications.
It informs applicants of their rights under the Real Estate Settlement Procedures Act (RESPA).
The statement indicates that servicing of the loan may be transferred to a different loan servicer.
Applicants are advised to save this statement with their loan documents.
The document specifies that the loan will be serviced at Fifth Third Mortgage Co and not transferred before the first payment is due.
